name: Bitsolara
description: Bitsolara is a next-generation Web3 platform that delivers gamified decentralized finance experiences directly through Telegram. It allows users to interact with on-chain mechanics via a seamless and intuitive mini-app interface. The Bitsolara ecosystem operates across two leading blockchain networks: TON Network : All in-app transactions, games, and social features are powered by TON, leveraging its high-speed infrastructure and deep integration with Telegram. Solana Network : The official Bitsolara Token is deployed on Solana, enabling fast, low-cost transactions and access to the broader Solana DeFi ecosystem. Bitsolara merges social engagement with decentralized financeâ€”creating a fun, accessible, and rewarding experience without ever leaving your chat screen.
